statements: SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM user_authentication WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT public_key FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, public_key FROM user_authentication WHERE username LIKE '%smith%';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE password_hash LIKE '%abc123%';
SELECT user_id, public_key FROM user_authentication ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, public_key FROM user_authentication WHERE username LIKE 'a%' ORDER BY username ASC;

SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM wallet WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM wallet WHERE balance < 500 ORDER BY balance;

SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '6bea6b8d-f9a3-4a77-935c-ebcb04e6c4d2' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM wallet WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%smith%' AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM wallet WHERE balance < 0);
SELECT user_id, username, balance FROM users INNER JOIN wallet ON users.user_id = wallet.user_id WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance DESC, username ASC;

SELECT * FROM wallets ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(wallet_id) AS wallet_count FROM wallets GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM wallets;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT wallet_id, balance FROM wallets WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.wallet_id, t.amount, w.balance FROM transactions t JOIN wallets w ON t.wallet_id = w.wallet_id WHERE t.amount > 5000;
SELECT u.username, w.balance, t.amount FROM users u JOIN wallets w ON u.user_id = w.user_id JOIN transactions t ON w.wallet_id = t.wallet_id WHERE t.amount < 0 ORDER BY t.timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
